body: So basically MC married Yayoi and now has a daughter with her. The grave at the end is MC's brother's grave. On the last panel we hear TV news saying corpse of the antagonist was found with stab wounds and is believed to be because he was involved in illegal drug trade. It's not hinted whether or not MC or Yayoi did the killing or it was just karma.
Finally read the manga version and now I found a new apreciation towards the animated one.
We ever gonna get a complete translation?
